text: #Ra <5v TTHRf qferazrut (Ts;5 9Rde7 &k TTHrf FAKT4, 4Rat ITTFR) National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways, Government of India) 74t T@ #1-5 % 6, 7427-10, E1qT, 7f @ccft 110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 T /Phone 91-11-25074100 25074200 NHAI/Policy Guidelines/Consultancy/2022 Policy Circular No. 10.1.34/2022 dated 1Oth 2022 {Decision taken on E-Office File No. NHAI/11033/CGM(F)/2022-OmnibusBG (Computer No: 128051)} Sub:: Addendum to Standard RFP Documents for engagement of Technical Consultants Extension of the provision of reduced Omnibus Bank Guarantee up to 31.10.2022 in the RFP documents MoRTH vide letter No. COVID-19/Road MAP/JS (H)/2020 dated 11.04.2022 has extended some relief measures to Contractors/ Developers along with extension of provision of reduced Performance security and Policy has accordingly been issued by NHAI vide Policy circular no 18.81 /Misc./2022 dated 28.04.2022_ 2 The relief in this regard was earlier provided vide MoRTH OM No. F No.G20016/01/2020- TF-Il dated 17.11.2020. Accordingly, the Policy Circular regarding, inter alia, reduction in Performance Security was issued vide NHAI Policy Circular No. 3.1.27 dated 19.11.2020. Policy Circular No_ 10.1.25 dated 09.12.2020 for reduced Omnibus Performance Security in consultancy contracts was also issued in line with these directions. 3_ The above provision of Omnibus performance Security as per Policy Circular No. 10.1.25 dated 09.12.2020 for engagement of technical consultants is hereby extended up to 31.10.2022, with other provisions of the Policy Circular remaining unchanged. 4_ This issues with the approval of the Competent Authority. 76/05112 (Sanjay Kumar Patel) General Manager (Coord.)
